mapper.select: select C.real_name as real_name, C.sex, C.age, C.email, C.phone, C.address, C.create_time, C.modified_time, A1.real_name as create_account_name, A2.real_name as modified_account_name from customer C left join account A1 on C.create_account_id = A1.account_id left join account A2 on C.modified_account_id = A2.account_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
